Source¶

glance_api.packages.functions¶

This module contains functions for api

class glance_api.packages.functions.Item(session)[source]¶

Items

delete(id)[source]¶

deletes item from database id: primary key of database item,

get(id=None, filter=None)[source]¶

get item id: primary key of database item, None returns all filter: item_type of database item, limit results to item_type

post(kwarg)[source]¶

post item to database kwarg: dict. user data to process. return: new Item object

glance_api.packages.functions.get_query(session, userquery)[source]¶

takes list of words and returns related objects

glance_api.packages.functions.to_dict(item_list)[source]¶

takes list of database objects, returns dict repr of objects.
